DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Evaluate Benzalkonium Chloride ( BAK ) Quinolone Eyedrop Reduces Likelihood Developing Resistant Organisms
DOC.criteria: Male Female At least 50 year age In good general health Any ocular surgery use topical antibiotic antiseptic either eye within last 3 month Use topical steroid , nonsteroidal anti inflammatory drug either eye within 30 day Baseline ( anticipate study ) Use lid scrub within 7 day Baseline either eye ( anticipate use study )
